item.title: macOS Sonoma 关闭光标输入法提示
item.description: Sonoma在每次切换输入法时都会在光标下跳一个提示框。如果装了AltTab的话，输入法提示会时不时自动蹦出来，很烦人。可以用如下命令禁用提示框。执行完需要重启系统才能生效 sudo mkdir -p /Library/Preferences/FeatureFlags/Domain sudo /usr/libexec/PlistBuddy -c "Add 'redesigned_text_cursor:Enabled' bool false" /Library/Preferences/FeatureFlags/Domain/UIKit.plist 参考: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/77248249/disable-macos-sonoma-text-insertion-point-cursor-caps-lock-indicator
